summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 10pcs Baby Girl Elastic Multicolor Flower Headband Rhinestone Hair Band Review Date: 2016/09/10 Store: Susenstone®610 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Rhinestone', 'Fabric Type': 'elastic', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '0 - 5 months', 'UPC': '638823006215', 'Manufacturer': 'Susenstone®'} Review Text: They're beautiful and look just like the picture! everything is solid on them! I can't wait to see our baby girl in them!! Review Title: They're beautiful and look just like the picture Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs Review Date: 2020/07/31 Store: MUSENCO Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'White', 'Size': '36 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Review Text: Not only are they beautiful but they stay!! I’ve been so nervous to try the new stick on nails trend but decided to go in and try these. I am so comfortable with them on! I’m not scared they’re going to pop of every 2 seconds. Especially with beauty shops being shut down on and off it’s an affordable and fun way to try out new stuff! I will say I used a UV lamp I already had after applying I’ll update when I try it without the UV lamp and as the days go by to see how they hold up. Review Title: Obsessed!!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Complete Nail Art Gel Kits for DIY Manicure, Pink Nude Series Review Date: 2020/07/31 Store: AIFAIFA Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Color': 'Pink', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.5 Pounds'} Review Text: Neat little set. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that the nail polish bottles weren’t labeled. Kind of messed me up at first thinking the bottom coat was the top but once I figured it out I taped the caps up so I can tell.
EDIT*** they ARE labeled!!! I’m just blind!! Review Title: Neat little set Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MUSE & Co Dazzling Swarovski Stick On Nails, Light Pink Nails Embellished with Swarovski Crystals "Elegant Princess" Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set, 36pcs Review Date: 2020/08/03 Store: MUSENCO Average Rating: 2.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Nude', 'Size': '36 Piece Set (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.79 x 4.33 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Review Text: Got my first pair and had to get more! They’re beautiful and stick great!!!! Review Title: Beautiful Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women Review Date: 2020/08/22 Store: AOFLLU Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: My daughter has very short hair and they don’t all fit up into her ponytail so we use these types of clips to pin up her fly aways. They have a strong hold and don’t fall out as easy as other brands we’ve tried! Plus the variety of colors is great so they can match her outfits. They were all accounted for as well! Highly recommend! Review Title: Strong hold Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4) Review Date: 2020/08/30 Store: KSang Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'} Review Text: These work great. Since stay at home order I’ve invested in doing my own pedis and these are a must! They get the job done and the colors are a cute touch! Review Title: Works great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series) Review Date: 2020/10/22 Store: MIZHSE Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} Review Text: I have their blue set so when I saw the links I knew I needed them and they do not disappoint! Easy application! You will need a Uv light to help cure and a base and top coat. It also came with a bonus glitter pot as a gift! Review Title: Love this brand Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days Review Date: 2020/12/10 Store: SuiteMade Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 1.14 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'STM-FMP-LAV', 'UPC': '734038263785'} Review Text: I was pretty skeptical when I saw that this was a foot peel I thought maybe I would just moisturize my feet at the most. Well I was in for a surprise because after three days my feet started peeling and my feet feel amazing. I am a total firm believer in this mask and I will totally recommend it Review Title: Started peeling after three days Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Color Changing Gel Nail Polish Set Spring Summer Mood Nail Polish for Starter and Professional 6 Colors Pink Red Blue Yellow Purple Brown Manicure Kit for Valentine’s Day Girlfriend Gift Review Date: 2020/12/14 Store: ASKITO Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ASKITO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting,Long-lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.62 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces'} Review Text: These gel polishes work really nicely. They play great and the color changing is so cool I’ve never seen anything like it and it’s a cool set to have in my collection. I’ve had many compliments. Review Title: Cute Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 3 Barrel Curling Iron, Milantia 3/4 Inch Mini Travel Curling Wand Hair for Small Curly, Dual Voltage Ceramic Tourmaline 19mm Crimper Hair Iron for Women - Fast Heating, Portable Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: Milantia Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'Milantia', 'Hair Type': 'All,Thick,Thin', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Dimensions': '9.25 x 1.97 x 1.97 inches; 12.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Milantia'} Review Text: This works amazing on my hair heat it up fast and easy to work with. Also because it’s a smaller size it’s great to travel with. New favorite hair tool Review Title: Works great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: uxosuz Beard Apron for Men Beard Catcher for Shaving Beard Apron Trimming Apron with 2pcs Suction Cups+ 1pc Brush Review Date: 2021/01/21 Store: uxosuz Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'UPC': '721996979933'} Review Text: This is super light weight and caught all of my husbands beard hairs. I was so sick of cleaning the sink because he wouldn’t clean it to my liking so this has saved me and him lol! Review Title: Works great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Microfiber Hair Towels - 5 Towel Set – 5 Beautiful Colors - Great for all Hair Types - Size (10 x 26 inches) Lightweight, Absorbent, and Ultra Soft. Colors Rose, Pink, Gray, Blue, and Lilac. Review Date: 2021/02/24 Store: AViBNiUM Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AViBNiUM', 'Towel form type': 'Hair Towel', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Microfiber', 'Product Dimensions': '26"L x 10"W', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 10 x 3 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '860005528004'} Review Text: Super convenient and they work amazing I love the color options and they could work in a goodie bag for a girls trip! Super fun idea and they dry well too! They have a loop to wrap around a button so it keeps in place! Review Title: Nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Licoville Halo Hair Extensions Human Hair Balayage Ash Brown to Ash Brown with Bleach Blonde Highlights Remy Hair Halo Extensions for Women 14 Inch 70g Straight One Piece Halo Hair Flip in Review Date: 2021/05/27 Store: Licoville Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Licoville', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Halo', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 4.02 x 1.85 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Review Text: I love this hair piece! It isn’t too heavy and gives me a fuller look to my hair! The match couldn’t be any better and I wear it all of the time!! So easy to put on!! Review Title: Love!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Amacle Hair Bow Organizer Holder for Girls - Hair Accessories Storage Wall Hanger, Pack of 3 Review Date: 2021/06/23 Store: Amacle Product Description: ['Specification:', 'Total length: 76 cm / 30 inch', 'Total length: 76 cm / 30 inch', 'Cloth string length: 55cm / 22 inch ( not included the hanging loop )', 'Cloth string length: 55cm / 22 inch ( not included the hanging loop )', 'Width: 25 cm / 10 inch', 'Width: 25 cm / 10 inch', 'Wood bar diameter: 1.5 cm / 0.6 inch', 'Wood bar diameter: 1.5 cm / 0.6 inch', 'Quantity: 3 pieces', 'Quantity: 3 pieces', 'Note:', 'All', 'hair clips', 'showing on the pics are', 'not included', '.'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '30 x 12 x 1 inches; 12.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '743811744472', 'Manufacturer': 'Huobei(Fuzhou)E-Commerce Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: These were perfect to organize my daughters bow collection in her room! we even got them color coordinated! they are stretchy and hang nicely! Especially considering the weight we put on them! Review Title: Perfect Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Luxsea 12 Colors Liquid Eyeliner Kit Matte and Glitter Colorful Cosmetic Pen Set Lasting Highly-Pigmented Extremely Fine Easy to Wear Waterproof Eye Liner Makeup Pen Set Review Date: 2021/07/18 Store: uxsea Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'uxsea', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic,Glitter,Shimmer,Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.97 x 5.51 x 0.55 inches; 0.71 Ounces'} Review Text: I am so picky about what eyeliners I use. these looked fun so I decided to give them a go. The color variety is awesome and they last so long! they're not easy to smudge and I love that! it will come off with makeup wipes and such but I love that I don't have to worry about it cracking through the day! Review Title: Long lasting Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Shopping Patterns:**

- **Focus on Beauty & Personal Care:** Frequent purchases of cosmetics, including nails, hair accessories, and skincare products, suggest a strong interest in personal grooming and aesthetics.
  
- **Emphasis on Quality and Performance:** High ratings and positive comments across multiple product reviews indicate preference for items that are durable, functional, and aesthetically pleasing.

- **Color Variety:** Strong inclination towards colorful products, particularly in hair accessories and nail items, showing a preference for vibrant and diverse styles.

- **Family-Oriented Purchases:** Products often cater to young children or family needs, especially regarding hair accessories and baby items, indicating a focus on family-oriented shopping.

- **Do-It-Yourself (DIY) Enthusiasm:** Several purchases suggest a trend towards DIY nail and beauty applications, indicating a hands-on approach to personal care, particularly during periods when salon access was limited.

- **Reusable Products:** Preference for items that are reusable or have long-lasting appeal, such as stick-on nails and hair extensions, signifies a desire for sustainable beauty solutions.

- **Gifting and Occasional Purchases:** Items purchased for special occasions (e.g., children's events) suggest a tendency to buy gifts or themed products for celebrations.

In conclusion, this shopper displays a strong affinity for colorful, high-quality beauty products that support personal grooming, with a family-centric approach and a preference for DIY solutions.
